transcript: Hello, this is Chris from Sales Corp. I understand you've been experiencing some issues with the platform. The error reports show limited usage. We do provide technical support, but that's included in our premium tiers. I see you're on the basic plan. The upgrade cost would be... Oh, I understand budget constraints are a concern. No, we don't offer monthly billing for enterprise features. I appreciate your time testing our solution. Let me know if your requirements or budget situation changes in the future.
